title: Avoidables Complete Serial 3
description: This serial is dedicated to the couples in the world that are willing to keep trying no matter what.Jason thought he'd lost Hope. She'd been showing interest in another man and it burnt his heart. The trial was underway and it was time to prove himself. When the cat rebels kidnapped him, he thought that he'd be killed. He had to get Hope back and he'd do anything to prove his worth to her. Even if that meant disowning the Perfects.
author: Rachel Medhurst
